definition: Heaven/Providence/God/the day before/the sky above/to fly to the sky/to take off and fly into space/to die/to pass away
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
lit. to go up to heaven or down to Hades (idiom)/fig. to go to great lengths/to search heaven and earth
lit. there is no road to the sky, nor door into the earth (idiom)/fig. to be at the end of one's rope/to be trapped in a hopeless situation
pinyin: shang4 tian1 wu2 lu4 , ru4 di4 wu2 men2

sentences.english: Bless her from marrying a miser.
sentences.chinese: 上天保佑她不要嫁给一个吝啬鬼。

sentences.english: I want to pray to God with my utmost sincere heart and I am willing to sacrifice my life to plead God for rain.
sentences.chinese: 我要用最虔诚的心向天神祷告，愿舍身祈求上天降雨。

sentences.english: The birds exploded into the air, all pipes and feathers.
sentences.chinese: 鸟群猛冲上天，鸣叫响成一片，羽毛纷纷飘落。

sentences.english: Exhume the light from its watery grave to receive the gift of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 光从水坟中撅出来，接受上天的礼物。

sentences.english: Thank Heaven, nations are great, independently of the lugubrious feats of the sword.
sentences.chinese: 感谢上天，民族的荣誉并不在残酷的武功。

sentences.english: Everything else is in God’s hands.
sentences.chinese: 其他的一切都是上天决定的。

sentences.english: Bosom 18 Ban military skill, can Heaven enter land, possess high-tech weapon.
sentences.chinese: 身怀十八般武艺，能上天入地，拥有高科技的武器。

sentences.english: People in many countries worshiped special deities intended to protect them from smallpox.
sentences.chinese: 在许多国家，人民祈拜特别神灵以求上天保佑。

sentences.english: Heaven lent you a soul Earth will lend a grave.
sentences.chinese: 上天借你一颗灵魂，尘世租你一块坟墓。

sentences.english: Othello . by heaven , i ' ll know thy thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 奥瑟罗凭著上天起誓，我一定要知道你的思想。

sentences.english: A cleft lip or palate is not a curse or omen.
sentences.chinese: 唇裂或腭裂并非上天的诅咒，厄运的征兆。

sentences.english: People aim for the stars, and they end up like goldfish in a bowl.
sentences.chinese: 人们总梦想上天摘星，结局却和鱼缸里的金鱼一样。

sentences.english: Wilt thou ride with me, some fine night, to see thy father?
sentences.chinese: 你愿意在一个晚上和我一起驾云上天去看你父亲吗？

sentences.english: He told me that the treadle pump was a gift from God.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉我，脚踏泵真是上天的恩赐。

sentences.english: Even if you make mistakes today, God still controls your future.
sentences.chinese: 即便你今天犯下了错误，上天依然把握着你的将来。

definition: to care for/to show concern for/to think longingly (of one's country)
favor/to give charity to sb out of pity
to show appreciation for sb/to look upon sb with favor
special favor from a ruler/Emperor's generosity towards a favorite
